product_description: Vintage Series Leather Conditioner (SPI_401_16SW) is the go-to solution for preserving, restoring, and protecting leather of all types. Designed for natural, synthetic, faux, and pleather surfaces, this premium formula nourishes from within, restoring essential oils and flexibility to keep leather soft, supple, and rich in appearance. This faux leather conditioner and leather seat conditioner is great for steering wheels, and dashboards. It works as a leather conditioner for boots, leather conditioner for purses, and a leather conditioner for jackets. It also works perfectly on furniture and sporting goods. The conditioner penetrates deep into leather pores to replenish smooth, helping to prevent cracking, fading, and premature aging while leaving behind a natural, matte sheen. Unlike greasy products, this formula absorbs quickly without leaving slippery or sticky residue. Whether you're caring for a classic interior, maintaining modern luxury seats, or keeping fashion accessories looking their best, Vintage Series Leather Conditioner delivers professional-grade results at home. Easy to apply with a microfiber applicator or cloth, it's perfect for regular maintenance or seasonal leather revival, ensuring your leather stays comfortable, durable, and beautiful for years to come. This leather conditioner is great for car ownrse and auto detailers to use on leather surfaces during car maintenance.

short_description: 3-IN-1 LEATHER CARE SOLUTION: Made in the USA, this car leather cleaner and conditioner cleans, conditions, and protects in one quick, easy spray and wipe application; the gentle formula removes buildup while preserving a natural finish

RESTORES AND MAINTAINS SUPPLENESS: Enriched with feeder oils and beeswax, this leather cleaner for car interior penetrates deep to nourish and restore buttery softness; regular use of this leather car seat cleaner helps prevent dryness

PROTECTS AGAINST SUN DAMAGE: Advanced polymers and carnauba combined with sun blockers in this leather restorer prevent abrasion, cracking, and fading, making this leather upholstery cleaner essential for long-term care

product_description: Maintain the luxurious look and feel of your leather with this auto leather cleaner and conditioner, designed to clean, condition, and preserve leather in one quick, easy spray and wipe application. Developed and manufactured in the USA to rigorous standards, we create, bottle, and distribute all our liquid car care products in our own U.S. Manufacturing and Distribution Center. This powerful car interior cleaner spray gently removes dirt and buildup from leather and vinyl surfaces, while conditioning with rich feeder oils and beeswax to keep leather soft and supple. Formulated with sun blockers, carnauba, and advanced polymers, it prevents abrasion, cracking, and fading, preserving the beauty of your vehicle’s interior. This vehicle leather cleaner is safe for use on a variety of leather types, including unfinished drum-dyed, aniline leather and vinyl coated leather. Not recommended for suede. Whether you need a car or RV leather seat cleaner, leather truck seat cleaner, marine leather cleaner, or leather sofa cleaner, this versatile formula restores and maintains the original finish. It also works as a faux leather cleaner, making it a must-have for all leather surfaces. Easy to apply with a simple spray and wipe, this premium leather cleaner keeps your interior looking pristine while leaving behind a fresh, genuine leather scent. Apply with our Blue Detail Sponges or Microfiber Detailing Mitt, while performing the final buff with our Dual-Weave Interior Towels.

product_description: Dirt, sunlight, heat, and humidity—they’re all working to dry out and crack the leather you love. Lexol All Leather Deep Conditioner will help prolong the life of all your leather investments. After an effortless cleaning with Lexol All Leather Deep Cleaner, simply smooth the conditioner into your leather—in minutes, fine oil droplets are absorbed, nourishing and preserving flexibility without leaving greasy residue. It’s an ideal leather conditioner for car interiors, briefcases, satchels, shoes, baseball gloves, softball gloves, and even leather furniture. With regular use, Lexol All Leather Deep Conditioner will preserve and protect leather’s suppleness. Lexol, Trusted since 1933.

NOT JUST FOR AUTO CARE - The Leather Cleaner & Conditioner Kit is the perfect one-two punch to restoring leather - interiors, jackets, shoes, purses, furniture and more; everyone has something leather in their home, keep it looking & smelling its best.

CLEAN, THEN CONDITION - Leather Cleaner is pH balance, colorless, and odorless; it penetrates the pores in leather to remove dirt and oils; Leather Conditioner, has a subtle leather scent & Vitamin E nourishes leather and helps reduce daily damage.

MADE IN AMERICA – Leather Cleaner and Conditioner are proudly produced in the USA. We celebrate the happiness of clean cars each day in our Southern California headquarters as well as our Detail Garage retail store locations throughout the country.

Directions Rub the dampened applicator onto the surface of the Fiebing’s Saddle Soap to create a lather. Then, apply the lather to the leather in a circular motion, working in small sections at a time. After cleaning a section, use a clean, damp cloth to wipe off any excess saddle soap residue. This helps remove dirt and soap from the leather’s pores.
